objective.name: Amjad Iftikhar
objective.objective: Curious and talented developer with a flair for creating elegant solutions in the least amount of time and have passion for responsive website design as well as a firm believer in the mobile-first approach. Have contributed in different projects to learn new development techniques and very passionate about new fields in the domain of tech and development.
